text: Jeroboamɨn amuim izavɨra itima, Ikiavɨra Itir God Ahiyan mɨgɨa ghaze, “Jeroboamɨn amuim nɨ bagh izɨ, uan otarimɨn arɨmariam gɨfofoghsɨ nɨn azangsɨghasa izi, a deragham ti. A ifar amizir igharazimɨn mɨn gan nɨ bagh izam.” Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God, biziba bar dar gun Jeroboamɨn amuim mɨkɨmasa Ahiya mɨkeme.
